kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=TestAPI, url=https://cpq-dev.cdsvisual.net, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

test.name: Verify the validation of the status token

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Set Variable

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: The current token is Unauthorized when should be authorized.
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.
kw.msg: The current token is Unauthorized when should be authorized.

test.status: The current token is Unauthorized when should be authorized.
